project-settings.name: The maximum number of days permitted when not limiting the records being queried. Limit to improve performance
When given, any fields matching the given regex will always be excluded from the list of data entry logs. Do not include any leading or trailing '/'s
If checked, event names are suffixed with the event ID e.g. 'Event 1 [66]' rather than simply 'Event 1'
If checked, arm names are suffixed with the arm ID e.g. 'Arm 1 [1]' rather than simply 'Arm 1'
If checked, DAG names are suffixed with the DAG ID e.g. 'DAG1 [1]' rather than simply 'DAG 1'
